title: Ring of No Affinity
content: Affinity Rings are randomly generated as loot, and will boost the level of a select spell by one. This effect can stack.

title: Amethyst Resonance Charm
content:
When around neck:
+15% Mana Regeneration

title: Ring of Expediency
content:
When worn as ring:
+15% Cast Time Reduction

title: Amulet of Concentration
content:
When around neck:
Long Casts become uninterruptible

title: Conjurer's Talisman
content:
When around neck:
+10% Summon Damage

title: Ring of Recovery
content:
When worn as ring:
+15% Cooldown Reduction

title: Emerald Stoneplate Ring
content:
When worn as ring:
Slain creatures drop +25% experience

title: Fireward Ring
content:
When worn as ring:
Grants fire immunity

title: Frostward Ring
content:
When worn as ring:
Grants freezing immunity

title: Heavy Chain
content:
When around neck:
+15% Spell Resistance

title: Ring of Mana
content:
When worn as ring:
+100 Max Mana

title: Poisonward Ring
content:
When worn as ring:
Grants poison immunity

title: Silver Ring
content:
When worn as ring:
+25 Max Mana

title: Alchemist Cauldron
content: Can be used to brew potions, craft elixirs, recycle scrolls, and upgrade ink. If a mob or player is placed in it while there is water, blood vials can also be produced. It has 4 input and 4 output slots, and must have water in it to activate. Right click to place a valid item into the input slots, and right click with a glass bottle to extract an output item.

title: Arcane Anvil
content: Used to upgrade scrolls, upgrade equipment, and imbue weapons

title: Arcane Debris
content: The magical Overworld equivalent of ancient debris, it can be found below y = -38, unexposed to air. Requires a netherite pickaxe to harvest. Used to smelt Arcane Salvage

title: Armor Pile
content: Found scattered throughout Ancient Battlegrounds. Harvesting with a diamond pickaxe will cause an Ancient Knight to spawn.

title: Inscription Table
content: Used to slot spells from scrolls into spell books for repeated use.

title: Pedestal
content: Unused block

title: Scroll Forge
content: Used to craft scrolls. The ink used determines the rarity of the spells. The level will always be the lowest level of that rarity. You cannot use an ink that is less rare than the minimum rarity of the scroll.

title: Ancient Knowledge Fragment
content: Can be found rarely in bookshelf loot, more commonly in Ancient Cities, or traded for by Wandering Traders

title: Arcane Essence
content: A common magic material used in many recipes. Can be found sparsely in vanilla structures, but much more commonly in magic structures or from killing magic mobs.

title: Arcane Ingot
content: Crafting ingredient

title: Arcane Rune
content: Crafting ingredient

title: Arcane Salvage
content: A late game material used for upgrade orbs, smelted from Arcane Debris

title: Blank Runestone
content: The base for all other runes to be crafted from. Can be found rarely in some vanilla structures, or more commonly in magic structures. Each school mage drops one for their school on death.

title: Blood Rune
content: Crafting ingredient

title: Blood Vial
content: Blood Focus. Place a lit campfire beneath a cauldron, and put a mob in the cauldron to cook the mob. This will fill the cauldron with blood, which can be withdrawn with glass bottles to obtain vials of blood.

title: Cinder Essence
content: Dropped from Ancient Knights. Used for upgrade orbs

title: Common Ink
content: Found commonly in magic structures or from killing powerful magic mobs

title: Recovery Rune
content: Crafting ingredient

title: Divine Pearl
content: Holy Focus

title: Dragonskin
content: Dropped from the Ender Dragon

title: Ender Rune
content: Crafting ingredient

title: Epic Ink
content: Found rarely in magic structures or from killing powerful magic mobs

title: Evocation Rune
content: Crafting ingredient

title: Fire Rune
content: Crafting ingredient

title: Frosted Helve
content: Crafting Ingredient

title: Frozen Bone
content: Ice Focus. Dropped from strays

title: Furled Map
content: Produces an explorer map when used. NBT driven.

title: Hogskin
content: Dropped from hoglins

title: Holy Rune
content: Crafting ingredient

title: Ice Rune
content: Crafting ingredient

title: Legendary Ink
content: Found very rarely in magic structures or from killing powerful magic mobs

title: Bottle o' Lightning
content: Lightning Focus. Use an empty bottle on a charged creeper to obtain. You can use the Lightning Bolt Spell, lightning rod or trident to charge a creeper.

title: Lightning Rune
content: Crafting ingredient

title: Arcane Cloth
content: Crafting ingredient

title: Nature Rune
content: Crafting ingredient

title: Permafrost Shard
content: Crafting Ingredient. Found in Impaled Icebreaker Shipwrecks.

title: Protective Rune
content: Crafting ingredient

title: Rare Ink
content: Found rarely in magic structures or from killing powerful magic mobs

title: Ruined Book
content: Crafting ingredient. Can be found in Ancient Cities.

title: Uncommon Ink
content: Found in magic structures or from killing powerful magic mobs

title: Empty Upgrade Orb
content: The base for all other upgrade orbs to be crafted from

title: Wayward Compass
content: Once crafted, it finds the nearest Catacombs and leads you towards it

title: Energized Core
content: Crafting ingredient

title: Artificer's Cane
content:
When in Either Hand:
4 Attack Damage, 1 Attack Speed, 2.5 Attack Range, +15% Cast Time Reduction, +15% Cooldown Reduction, +10% Spell Power

title: Blaze Instruction Manual
content:
When equipped as Spell Book:
+10% Fire Spell Power

title: The Blood Staff
content:
When in Either Hand:
8 Attack Damage, 1 Attack Speed, 2.5 Attack Range, +15% Blood Spell Power, +5% Spell Power, +10% Summon Damage

title: Dragonskin Spell Book
content:
When equipped as Spell Book:
+10% Ender Spell Power

title: Druidic Tome
content:
When equipped as Spell Book:
+10% Nature Spell Power

title: Grimoire of Evokation
content: Fang Strike (6), Fang Ward (4), Summon Vex (4)

title: Apprentice's Spell Book
content:
When equipped as Spell Book:
+15% Cast Time Reduction

title: Graybeard Staff
content:
When in Either Hand:
3 Attack Damage, 1 Attack Speed, 2.5 Attack Range, +10% Spell Power, +25% Mana Regeneration

title: Ice Staff
content:
When in Either Hand:
5 Attack Damage, 1 Attack Speed, 2.5 Attack Range, +25% Mana Regeneration, +15% Ice Spell Power, +5% Spell Power

title: Decrepit Flamberge
content:
Two-Handed, When in Main Hand:
11 Attack Damage, 1.3 Attack Speed, 2.75 Attack Range, +5 Armor

title: Magehunter
content:
When in Main Hand:
7 Attack Damage, 1.6 Attack Speed, 2.5 Attack Range, +25% Spell Resistance

title: Necronomicon
content: Blood Slash (5), Blood Step (5), Ray of Siphoning (5), Blaze Storm (5)

title: Ancient Codex
content:
When equipped as Spell Book:
+20% Cooldown Reduction

title: Rotten Spell Book
content:
When equipped as Spell Book:
-15% Spell Resistance

title: Villager Bible
content:
When equipped as Spell Book:
+8% Cast Time Reduction, +8% Holy Spell Power

title: Rod o' Lightning
content:
When in Either Hand:
5 Attack Damage, 1 Attack Speed, 2.5 Attack Range, +15% Cooldown Reduction, +5% Spell Power, +15% Lightning Spell Power

title: Acupuncture
content: Around a targeted creature, create a field of blood needles in every direction, shooting down and healing you for 25% of damage done

title: Blood Needles
content: Create a ring of needles made from blood and fire them forward, skewering targets and healing you for 25% of damage done

title: Blood Slash
content: Slash forward to send out a concentrated blade of blood, slicing through creatures and healing for 15% of damage done.

title: Blood Step
content: Instantaneously teleport to where you are looking, or directly behind any targeted creature. Gain a short duration of true invisibility upon reaching your destination.

title: Devour
content: Pull in a nearby creature and attack them with a bite, leeching 15% of damage done as health. If the creature is killed, you temporarily gain additional max HP. Created by the ancient magician known as Yorhavich

title: Heartstop
content: Cast to inflict yourself with Heartstop, an effect that makes you temporarily invulnerable. However, once it wears off, you take 50% of all damage accumulated while under its effects.

title: Raise Dead
content: Cast to summon undead minions from the earth beneath you. The higher the power, the better equipment they will have.

title: Ray Of Siphoning
content: Hold to cast a ray of necrotic energy that siphons health from creatures it hits, damaging them and healing you for 100% of damage done.

title: Wither Skull
content: Launch a wither skull forward that explodes in a small radius around the impact. The higher the level, the faster the projectile.

title: Sacrifice
content: Target one of your magic summons to cause them to explode, killing them instantly, and dealing large damage in the area around them. The summon's remaining health boosts the damage dealt and radius of explosion.

title: Counterspell
content:
• Interrupt player and mob casting
  • Banishes summoned shield , blood slash , creeper head
  • Banishes summoned creatures
  • Removes root
  • Removes mob effects like fortify or evasion

title: Dragon Breath
content: Hold to spew a cone of dragon breath forwards. Each time a creature is hit, there is a chance to create a pool of dragon breath at their feet.

title: Evasion
content: Cast to imbue yourself with ender energy. Upon being attacked while under its effects, you will immediately teleport within a short radius and avoid taking any damage. Only a finite amount of hits can be dodged before the effect immediately wears off.

title: Magic Arrow
content: Hold to charge a piercing arrow made of arcane energy. This arrow has no gravity and can travel through blocks.

title: Magic Missile
content: Shoot a bolt of concentrated arcane magic. Also a trademark of every wizard.

title: Starfall
content: Target a single area and continuously rain down arcane comets from above for the duration of the spell

title: Teleport
content: Instantaneously teleport to where you are looking, leaving nothing but a cloud of ender energy behind.

title: Summon Ender Chest
content: Apparate your Ender Chest inventory upon casting.

title: Recall
content: Warps you back to your spawn location, or world spawn if there is none.

title: Portal
content: Creates two portals that allows players to travel back and forth between them.

title: Echoing Strikes
content: While under the effects of the spell, non-magical attacks will leave an echo of ender energy behind, shortly thereafter exploding with an echo of the original attack's damage.

title: Black Hole
content: Around a targeted location, create a fissure into the void, manifesting a black hole that will suck in nearby creatures and slowly crush them to death

title: Chain Creeper
content: Around a targeted creature or block, conjure a ring of creeper heads that falls to the ground and explodes. Any creature killed by this blast will conjure another, smaller, ring of creeper heads. This can chain multiple times.

title: Fang Strike
content: Conjure a line of evoker fangs in front of you, in classic illager fashion.

title: Fang Ward
content: Conjure protective rings of evoker fangs around you, in classic illager fashion.

title: Firecracker
content: Instantaneously conjure a firework where you look that explodes in a small radius around it.

title: Gust
content: Conjure a strong gust of wind, knocking back creatures in a conical shape, causing damage if they impact a wall

title: Invisibility
content: Cast to briefly grant yourself true invisibility, which hides armor and held items, but immediately wears off upon dealing damage. Mobs also lose aggro.

title: Lob Creeper
content: Lob the head of a creeper forward that explodes in a medium radius around the impact. The higher the level, the faster the projectile.

title: Shield
content: Conjure a stationary shield of arcane energy where you look that will block projectiles and prevent creatures from passing.

title: Spectral Hammer
content: Conjure a spectral hammer out from where you look that will mine all connected stone-type blocks in a cube where it hits, leaving only ores and rubble behind.

title: Summon Horse
content: Conjure a spectral steed that will follow you around and only let you ride. The horse's speed, health, and jump height scales with spell power.

title: Summon Vex
content: Cast to conjure vexes that will follow, protect, and fight for you.

title: Slow
content: In a radius around a targeted creature, apply the Slowed effect to enemies, decreasing movement speed, attack speed, mining speed, mana regeneration, and cast time for a duration.

title: Arrow Volley
content: Around a targeted creature or block, summon a rolling wave of magical arrows from the sky.

title: Wololo
content: Wololo!

title: Blaze Storm
content: Hold to unleash a barrage of blaze fireballs, shooting rapidly but wildly in front of you and igniting any creatures or blocks hit.

title: Burning Dash
content: Quickly launch yourself forward in a haze of fire, searing creatures you pass through while in a blaze.

title: Fireball
content: Manifest and throw a ball of fire, exploding and dealing massive damage on impact.

title: Firebolt
content: Shoot a small projectile of fire, igniting whatever it hits.

title: Fire Breath
content: Hold to spew a cone of fire outwards, igniting creatures and blocks in its path.

title: Magma Bomb
content: Launch a bomb made from magma, exploding on impact and leaving a field of fire where it lands

title: Wall Of Fire
content: Recast to place anchor points, which erupts into a wall of fire when the cast finishes, or when the maximum length is reached. This wall blocks projectiles and ignites creatures that pass through it.

title: Heat Surge
content: Emanate a surge of fiery magic, igniting and rending creatures in a radius around you. Rended creatures have reduced armor.

title: Flaming Strike
content: Unleash a sweeping melee attack in the form of a wreath of flames. This spell is uninterruptible. The damage scales off of your held weapon's melee damage and enchantments.

title: Scorch
content: In a targeted area, erupt a scorch of fiery magic, damaging creatures in the zone and leaving a field of fire.

title: Flaming Barrage
content: Cast to select targets, which at the end of recasting, will each be under barrage of small fireballs.

title: Angel Wing
content: Cast to gain wings made of holy energy, acting as an elytra, for a brief period of time.

title: Blessing Of Life
content: Cast to target any creature, showing a glowing outline. Completing the cast will heal this creature.

title: Fortify
content: Upon casting, fortify every friendly creature within a radius around you, giving them temporary HP.

title: Greater Heal
content: A more powerful but much slower version of heal, this spell will completely heal yourself upon being casted.

title: Guiding Bolt
content: Fire a slow bolt of holy energy. Creatures hit will gain the Guided effect, homing nearby projectiles in towards them

title: Healing Circle
content: Around a targeted creature or block, place a stationary circle of holy magic that heals allies within

title: Heal
content: Cast to infuse yourself with holy energy and immediately regain health.

title: Wisp
content: Conjure a projectile of holy energy that will float towards nearby targets and deal damage upon impact.

title: Divine Smite
content: With a fervor of holy energy, swing forth your weapon, doing a melee area attack. This spell is uninterruptible. The damage scales off of your held weapon's melee damage and enchantments.

title: Haste
content: In a radius around a targeted creature, or yourself if no creature is targeted, apply the Hastened effect, increasing movement speed, attack speed, mining speed, mana regeneration, and cast time reduction for a duration.

title: Cone Of Cold
content: Hold to cast out a cone of cold energy, freezing creatures in its path.

title: Frost Step
content: Instantaneously teleport to where you are looking, leaving behind a shadow of ice. This shadow will shatter after 3 seconds or upon taking any damage, shooting out icicles in every direction.

title: Ice Block
content: Conjure a giant chunk of ice above a targeted creature or block. After a short delay, it will fall down and explode for area frost damage, doing additional damage to any creatures hit on the way down.

title: Icicle
content: Fire a piercing bolt of cold energy in the form of an icicle, freezing those it touches.

title: Summon Polar Bear
content: Cast to summon a polar bear who will follow, protect, and fight for you, as well as providing a mount.

title: Ray Of Frost
content: Fire a beam of cold energy, dealing low damage but immediately applying freeze to the creature hit.

title: Frostwave
content: Cascade a wave of frost magic in a radius around you, afflicting creatures with chilled. Chilled creatures are slowed, and have their incoming freeze time doubled.

title: Ascension
content: Cast to strike lightning at your feet and ascend quickly into the air, and gain reduced gravity for the next few seconds.

title: Chain Lightning
content: Start a chain of lightning from a targeted creature, causing waves of zapping magic to cascade to nearby creatures

title: Charge
content: Imbue yourself with the power of lightning, increasing your speed and combat abilities.

title: Electrocute
content: Hold to manifest a cone of electrical energy, damaging creatures in its path.

title: Lightning Bolt
content: Down from the heavens, summon a bolt of lightning.

title: Lightning Lance
content: Hold to charge a spear made of lightning. Release to throw it like a javelin, dealing high damage to the creature it hits.

title: Shockwave
content: Coalesce a surge of electrical power, and unleash it in a devastating shockwave, blasting exposed creatures.

title: Thunderstorm
content: Cast to conjure a thunderstorm centered around yourself, which strikes nearby creatures within sight with a small bolt of lightning every 2 seconds for the spell's duration.

title: Ball Lightning
content: Conjure an orb of lightning that slowly moves forward, damaging creatures it phases through and bouncing off blocks.

title: Acid Orb
content: Spit an orb of acid, splashing in a radius upon impact and rending creatures hit, melting away and reducing their armor

title: Blight
content: Target a creature to blight them, reducing their incoming healing and outgoing damage

title: Poison Arrow
content: Charge a powerful arrow, imbued with poison magic, that will release a poisonous cloud upon impact

title: Poison Breath
content: Spew forth a cone of poison, damaging and poisoning creatures in its reach

title: Poison Splash
content: Around a targeted creature or block, conjure a wave of poisonous magic that splashes down, damaging creatures hit and leaving behind a poisonous cloud

title: Root
content: Around a targeted creature, sprout magical roots than entangle them and completely prevent non-magical movement

title: Spider Aspect
content: Instill yourself with poisonous magic, dealing additional melee, ranged, or spell damage creatures that are poisoned

title: Firefly Swarm
content: Emanate a swarm of violent fireflies, following a targeted creature and dealing aoe damage. If the initial target dies, the last harmed creature will be targeted.

title: Oakskin
content: The great power of oak infuses itself into your skin, granting damage reduction of any incoming damage for a duration.

title: Earthquake
content: Conjure an earthquake around a targeted creature or location, causing tremors to ripple through the ground, damaging and slowing creatures in the area.

title: Stomp
content: With a magic force, stomp the ground in front of you and send a short tremor forward through the ground, damaging creatures in its path.

title: Gluttony
content: Turn your stomach into an arcane furnace, turning eaten food into mana for a duration.

title: Abyssal Shroud
content: Cloak yourself with the shadows of the abyss, granting the ability to evade any attack for a short duration of time.

title: Sculk Tentacles
content: From where you look, erupt a mass of sculk energy in the form of wailing tentacles, damaging and blinding creatures caught in the chaos.

title: Sonic Boom
content: Blast forth a sonic boom of immense power, passing through solid material with ease and harming the first creature in its path.

title: Planar Sight
content: Shift your vision in between planes, gaining the ability to see creatures through solid material.

title: Telekinesis
content: Reach out with a spectral force and grip a creature, forcing them towards your gaze. Creatures are susceptible to kinetic damage.

title: Eldritch Blast
content: Fire rays of pure, devastating energy.

title: Archevoker Boots
content:
When on Feet:
+3 Armor, +8% Evocation Spell Power, +100 Max Mana

title: Archevoker Coat
content:
Can be Imbued (0/1), When on Body:
+8 Armor, +8% Evocation Spell Power, +100 Max Mana

title: Archevoker Hat
content:
When on Head:
+3 Armor, +8% Evocation Spell Power, +100 Max Mana

title: Archevoker Leggings

+6 Armor, +8% Evocation Spell Power, +100 Max Mana
